nodes.text: Attack on the Hutt Cartel listening post

The Attack on the Hutt Cartel listening post was a space battle engaged by the Sith Empire to destroy a listening post owned by the Hutt Cartel situated near Nar Shaddaa. Imperial Intelligence discovered that the Cartel shared the information from this listening post with the Galactic Republic; so the Sith assembled a fleet of Terminus-class destroyer and Sith starfighters to destroy it, but the space station was defended by a large Republic fleet so the Sith Command called for reinforcements, requesting any Sith forces in the areas. With these new fighters, especially a very skilled Sith pilot, the Empire succeeded in accomplishing the mission.
